name: Samirasa's Hideout
text:
As Samirasa's Hideout enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type have swarming (Any creatures with swarming can attack or block in a swarm. Swarms are blocking or blocked as a group. If any creatures with swarming a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature’s combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it’s being blocked by or is blocking. Creatures in a swarm have the abilities of all creatures in the swarm.)
